title: How do I use smart unlock?
answer:
Smart unlock makes unlocking your phone a breeze. Simply bring your Bluetooth device within range of your phone and press the power key to unlock. No password is required. To use smart unlock, you will need a supported Huawei phone and a Bluetooth-enabled device, such as a headset or wristband. The steps for enabling smart unlock with a Bluetooth headset are as follows: 

1. Open **Settings** and select **Screen lock & passwords**. Select **Password** and enter a password (skip this step if you already have a password). 

2. Open **Settings** and select **Screen lock & passwords**. Select **Smart unlock**, as shown below: 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151015174408275001.jpg) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151015174433869001.jpg) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151015174447832001.jpg) 

 3. Enter your screen unlock password to enter the smart unlock settings screen. Connect your Bluetooth device as shown below: 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151015174541224001.jpg) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151015174558179001.jpg) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151015174612435001.jpg) 

 4. Select **Add a Bluetooth device**, enable **Smart unlock** and then select the Bluetooth device you connected during Step 3 as shown below: 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151015174659555001.jpg) 

 5. Once configured, you can unlock your phone using a Bluetooth device when it is in range. 

Note: When more than one Bluetooth device is connected to your phone, all devices can use the smart unlock feature.
